h2_title: How to Find Father of Stones
content: From the Heights of Ember Keeper's Shrine, continue toward the open space on the left. When you reach a certain point, the Father of Stones miniboss will jump over the wall near the door on the right.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Father_of_Stones.md", within the section "Father of Stones" and the sub-section "How to Find Father of Stones". The content is presented below:

From the Heights of Ember Keeper's Shrine, continue toward the open space on the left. When you reach a certain point, the Father of Stones miniboss will jump over the wall near the door on the right.
